channel.title: [317 Delta] turmoil
channel.description:
iv been looking for a tut on how to add turmoil to delta but cant find one
does anyone know a tut or how to add turmoil to delta?
any help would be great
thanks

item.title: [317 Delta] turmoil
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

[quote=“MoreWeed, post:5, topic:376590”]i did search on google and i used the search bar on this site, like i said i cant find one, was just asking if anyone knew a tut >.< simple yes or no would have been ok =/

but ok >.<[/quote]

[center]Half of these guys are ass-cakes saying use google because they don’t know how to do it them selves.

Ok, If you have Piety and Chivalry, you have custom sprites added to your interface. In your server find the prayer variables and create a new one same goes for client just add a new one when searching Piety, Add the custom sprite and set the name to what your going to call your sprite when you add it to your sprite folder. Rip the Piety effect tweek it a little bit. Add the requirements to use the prayer in your server sided. And done.

If you want more help, add me on msn: Akcoder@hotmail.co.uk[/center]

Read full topic
